title: With all this upset over BE.. I have a question for you all
body:
Assuming you play 3 games a day, win about 50% over X period of time, with at least 1 win a day guaranteed....

How long should it take you to unlock all champions?

Honestly a good number to me using those metrics would be about 5 years. Currently... lets just say it would take a little longer than 5 years
